speaker: Sun Jim
title: Video Moderation with Content Moderator
description: Content moderation is the process of monitoring for possible offensive, undesirable, and risky content. Content Moderator (https://azure.microsoft.com/services/cognitive-services/content-moderator/)  a Cognitive Services product, combines machine-assisted content moderation APIs and human review tool for images, text, and videos into a complete content moderation solution. In this episode, we will get an overview of Content Moderator and learn about its video moderation (https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/content-moderator/video-moderation-human-review) capabilities. We will cover the API and the human review capabilities in Content Moderator.
